casebody.data:
Sherry RILEY, in her Own Right and as Administratrix of the Estate of Jeffery L. Riley, Petitioner
v.
ARMSTRONG WORLD INDUSTRIES, INC. and Brenntag Northeast, Inc., Respondents No. 828 MAL 2018 Supreme Court of Pennsylvania. May 30, 2019

ORDER

PER CURIAM .

AND NOW, this 30th day of May, 2019, the Petition for Allowance of Appeal is DENIED.
